info.title: JetCats API
info.description: Spendy App allows to manage user's income and expense.

post.description: **Register** a new user. Credentials pair is valid email and password. **Ensure** that password is strong.
**Login** an user. Credentials pair is valid email and password.
**Login** an user. Credentials pair is valid email and password.
**Refresh** a user session. Use this endpoint to get a new pair of a sessionId and refreshToken in cookie and an access token in the response json body, if access token is expired.
**Send email** to the user to reset its password. **Provide** an user email address to which the server should send an email with a password reset link.

email.description: The email address to get the password reset link.

post.description: **Reset** the user's password. **Provide** a signed JSON web token contained information about the user and a new password to the reset.

requestBody.description: Data to reset the user's password

token.description: A JSON web token with info about the **user**: {**userId, email**} and a **time stamp** when it expires.

get.description: **Get** google auth URL to use it in GET HTTP request to get an user code with permission and user data.

post.description: **Login** with google OAuth API. Pass in the request JSON body code gotten from the same name query parameter of URL that the google consent screen redirects to.

code.description: The **code** query parameter retrieved from the URL to which google consent screen redirects. </br> **This URL** looks like: </br> [http://domain-name.com/auth/confirm-oauth?**code=4%2F0Ab_5qlk0KhUUB4nN9ThyM9dTe4_fUvUOet8Vwab2B9pAG1ds5cvLq3KGaGrkHOznH5dF-g**&scope=email+profile+openid+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fuserinfo.email+https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fuserinfo.profile&authuser=8&prompt=none]()

get.description: Get list of users with this endpoint
Get list of transactions with this endpoint

patch.description: Logged-in user can update their own transaction.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The ID of the transaction to update

get.description: Deletes a transaction belonging to the authenticated user, specified by its ID.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The ID of the transaction to delete (MongoDB ObjectId)

get.description: Returns summary of income and expenses (for month and year)

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period in YYYY-MM format (e.g. "2025-05"). Defaults to current month if not provided.

get.description: Get list of categories with this endpoint

patch.description: Logged-in user can update their own transaction.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The ID of the transaction to update

delete.description: Deletes a transaction belonging to the authenticated user, specified by its ID.

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: The ID of the transaction to delete (MongoDB ObjectId)

get.description: Returns summary of income and expenses (for month and year)

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period in YYYY-MM format (e.g. "2025-05"). Defaults to current month if not provided.

name.description: An user name, not part of credentials.
User name, not a credentials part.

email.description: Email is a login of user

enum: Auth header should be of type Bearer

registerUser-201.description: Successfully registered an user! Response contains the json object with data of the new user.

items.description: Represent one of errors from the scope.

paths.description: Represent property path in the request body json

type.description: The type of request json property that excepted an error/s

value.description: The property value that excepted an error

key.description: The key of property that excepted an error

registerUser-409.description: The user with the specified email address already exists.

loginUser-200.description: Successfully authenticated! Response contains the json object with an access token. </br> The **session id** and **refresh token** are returned in **cookies** named **sessionId** and **refreshToken** respectively. Include these cookies in subsequent requests.

data.description: An object conains a token to attach it to every http request to access protected resources.

accessToken.description: Every access token is valid within 15 min.

refreshUser-200.description: Successfully refreshed a session! Response contains the json object with an acces token. </br> The **session id** and **refresh token** are returned in **cookies** named "sessionId" and "refreshToken" respectively. Include these cookies in subsequent requests.

data.description: An object conains a token to attach it to every http request to access protected resources.

accessToken.description: Every access token is valid within 15 min.

enum: Auth header should be of type Bearer

sendResetEmail-200.description: Reset password email has been successfully sent. Response contains the json object with an empty object data.

message.example: Reset password email has been successfully sent.

resetEmail-200.description: Password has been successfully reset! Response contains the json object with an empty object data.

items.description: Represent one of errors from the scope.

paths.description: Represent property path in the request body json

type.description: The type of request json property that excepted an error/s

value.description: The property value that excepted an error

key.description: The key of property that excepted an error

enum: Auth header should be of type Bearer

resetPassword-404.description: The user is absent in the database

getGoogleOAuthUrl-200.description: Successfully get google OAuth url! Response contains the json object with an appropriated url address of the google consent screen.

items.description: Represent one of errors from the scope.

paths.description: Represent property path in the request body json

type.description: The type of request json property that excepted an error/s

value.description: The property value that excepted an error

key.description: The key of property that excepted an error

400-invalidId.description: Invalid transaction Id or wrong body data

message.example: The following id: ttrpaPPOperpog14po42p is not valid

400-invalidIdOrBodyData.description: Invalid contactId or wrong body data

message.example: "contactType" must be one of [work, home, personal]

invalidContactId.description: The URL path parameter **contactId** is invalid

wrongBodyData.description: The body data of the request is wrong, for example, the request body doesn't consist the required parameters or they have invalid values.

data.message: "contactType" must be one of [work, home, personal]

schema.example: sessionId=67f93807aaafe44c3fd07fb7; Path=/; Expires=Fri, 30 May 2025 03:35:20 GMT; HttpOnly; refreshToken=uEYNbhC4jQ6YcoV9hLPfQRI8oE4ZI/khZyCRkLlh; Path=/; Expires=Fri, 30 May 2025 03:35:20 GMT; HttpOnly;
sessionId=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; refreshToken=; Path=/; Expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT;

schema.description: The session id. It's set by the backend server.
The refresh token to get a new session id in cookie  and an access token in json body of the server response. It's set by the backend server.
